attributes.action: STOP plans for a Thames Estuary airport
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson has no jurisdiction in Kent; use existing airports effectively; develop Manston; continual growth is economically unsustainable; cheap air travel is history; the estuary airport will come 20 years too late; fuel supplies are finite; Boris's plans will decimate Kent and Essex; Kent Marshes are a world protected site; regular bird strike; the sunken timebomb (Montgomery ship); changed tidal flows in the Thames; London Array Wind Farm and its affect on radar ... need I say more?
